api_list.name: showPetById

required_parameters.name: petId
required_parameters.description: The id of the pet to retrieve

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pet-shop.p.rapidapi.com/pets/string"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pet-shop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pet-shop.p.rapidapi.com/pets/{petid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pet-shop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: listPets

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)
